about.title: About Me
about.content: Experienced in building both simple landing pages and complex high-load applications (50+ pages) with deep performance optimization. Worked as a freelancer, which taught me to communicate effectively with clients and meet tight deadlines. Constantly research native JS and frameworks, follow trends through industry resources. Have entrepreneurial experience - proposed solutions to clients that increased their sales. Fluent in English. Excited to work in a company that shares a passion for technology.

skills.title: Skills
skills.content: JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, Next.js, Redux, Redux Toolkit, HTML, CSS (flex, grid), Tailwind CSS, Git, REST API, Webpack, Vite, Jest, React Testing Library (RTL), ES Lint, English B2+

education.title: Education
education.content: Computer Science 09.03.01, Bauman Moscow State Technical University

workExperience.desc:
Developed a Next.js SPA from scratch (50+ pages): SSR/SSG for SEO, dynamic routes, multilingual support (i18n).
Key implementations: role-based access system with JWT auth, video platform with custom player, interactive dashboards with charts (Chart.js).
Performance optimization: reduced TTI by 35% via code splitting + lazy loading, decreased bundle size by 30% (Webpack Bundle Analyzer), configured API caching (SWR).
Processes & collaboration: set up CI/CD (GitHub Actions), close work with CEO - proposed business logic solutions (boosted conversion by 20%), received product co-ownership offer for significant contributions.
workExperience.stack: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Redux Toolkit, Redux Thunk, Vite, MUI, CSS Modules

workExperience.desc:
Developed an admin panel for a mobile app alongside a Middle+ Frontend Developer.
Key tasks: implemented complex forms and validation, created reusable UI components, optimized builds, conducted code reviews and joint codebase refactoring.
workExperience.stack: React, TypeScript, Redux Toolkit, Prime React, Webpack, Git Flow

nonCommercialExperience.stack: Vue 2/3, React, Redux, Effector, Zustand, Tailwind..
